name: ANA FESTA Terminal 1
location: T1 South Wing / 2F / After Security Check
about: An extensive menu of light meals offered to passengers departing on domestic flights in Terminal 1. Popular confectionery and other miscellaneous items also available.

name: BENITORA Xiao Chi
location: T3 / 2F / Before Security Check
about: Xiao Chi in Chinese means snacks and street food.  This restaurants offers casual dining with popular Chinese meals such as Black Sesame Szechuan Noodles, one of the stars of BENITORA GYOZABO. We recommend the hearty Shimidare Pork Buns which are delicious right down to the last bight. Great for a light snack or for when you are feeling a little hungry.

name: BOTEJYU EXPRESS
location: T3 / 2F / Before Security Check
about: This shop is a branch of BOTEJYU, the okonomiyaki restaurant founded in Osaka in 1946, serving authentic foods from the area. We offer an extensive range of menus including Modern-yaki invented by BOTEJYU, takoyaki octopus balls from Osaka, and Moriyama deep fried chicken from Nakatsu, Oita prefecture, the Mecca of deep fried chicken.

name: CAFE & DINING N's COURT
location: T2 Center / 4F / Before Security Check
about: A spacious cafeteria with over 200 seats, the largest in Terminal 2. Designed in the image of a courtyard within an airport terminal, the facility is divided into a sofa area, counter chairs, and seats for families so that customers can rest and relax according to their needs. A wide range of menus are available from Japanese food to Western and Chinese cuisine.

name: CAFE & BAR AVION
location: T1 No.3 Satellite / 3F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: Relax with a drink and snack before boarding.

name: cafee LAT.25 Terminal3 2F
location: T3 / 2F / Before Security Check
about: 60 years roasting the world's finest coffee beans.  We stand at the pinnacle of selecting and roasting coffee from around the world, unmoved by traditions or by trends and offering the very pest in our pursuit of the essence of supreme favor.

name: cafee LAT.25 Terminal3 3F
location: T3 / 3F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: 60 years roasting the world's finest coffee beans.  We stand at the pinnacle of selecting and roasting coffee from around the world, unmoved by traditions or by trends and offering the very pest in our pursuit of the essence of supreme favor.

name: cafee LAT.25 Terminal1
location: T1 North Wing / 1F / Before Security Check
about: 60 years roasting the world's finest coffee beans.  We stand at the pinnacle of selecting and roasting coffee from around the world, unmoved by traditions or by trends and offering the very pest in our pursuit of the essence of supreme favor.

name: Dashichazuke EN
location: T1 Central Building / 4F / Before Security Check
about: Specializing in Dashichazuke with the rich taste of the highest quality dashi stock. Fast food with an authentic flavor. Try our glistening golden soup with seaweed, dried sardines, several types of dried bonito flakes and chicken, plus seasonal toppings. Enjoy a moment of relaxation.

name: DEAN & DELUCA CAFE Terminal1
location: T1 Central Building / 4F / Before Security Check
about: Developed by gourmet grocery store Dean & DeLuca, this café offers an extensive food menu alongside carefully crafted cups of coffee and seasonal drinks.

name: DEAN & DELUCA CAFE Terminal2
location: T2 Satellite / 3F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: Developed by gourmet grocery store Dean & DeLuca, this café offers an extensive food menu alongside carefully crafted cups of coffee and seasonal drinks.

name: DOUTOR COFFEE SHOP Terminal1
location: T1 North Wing / 3F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: A self-service style cafe using fresh coffee beans brought and roasted directly from Doutor's own facility. Enjoy an extensive menu ranging from real coffee to delicious food.

name: DOUTOR COFFEE SHOP Terminal2
location: T2 Center / B1F / Before Security Check
about: A self-service style cafe using fresh coffee beans brought and roasted directly from Doutor's own facility. Enjoy an extensive menu ranging from real coffee to delicious food.

name: FaSoLa Cafe coffee & beer Terminal2
location: T2 Center / 2F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: Overlooking the corridor connecting the main and satellite buildings in Terminal 2, FaSoLa Cafe offers a great view of the numerous aircraft moving around the apron areas. The stylish, spacious and friendly interior welcomes those looking for somewhere to relax or those seeking something quick and easy before boarding. As well as a cafe menu including coffee and light meals, there is also an extensive bar menu offering beer, whiskey, cocktails and nibbles. Why not start your journey on the right foot by dropping in at FaSoLa Cafe?

name: FaSoLa Cafe coffee & beer Terminal1 No.4 Satellite
location: T1 No.4 Satellite / 3F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: Overlooking the corridor connecting the main and satellite buildings in Terminal 2, FaSoLa Cafe offers a great view of the numerous aircraft moving around the apron areas. The stylish, spacious and friendly interior welcomes those looking for somewhere to relax or those seeking something quick and easy before boarding. As well as a cafe menu including coffee and light meals, there is also an extensive bar menu offering beer, whiskey, cocktails and nibbles. Why not start your journey on the right foot by dropping in at FaSoLa Cafe?

name: FaSoLa Cafe coffee & beer Terminal1 No.5
location: T1 No.5 Satellite / 3F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: Overlooking the corridor connecting the main and satellite buildings in Terminal 2, FaSoLa Cafe offers a great view of the numerous aircraft moving around the apron areas. The stylish, spacious and friendly interior welcomes those looking for somewhere to relax or those seeking something quick and easy before boarding. As well as a cafe menu including coffee and light meals, there is also an extensive bar menu offering beer, whiskey, cocktails and nibbles. Why not start your journey on the right foot by dropping in at FaSoLa Cafe?

name: FRESHNESS BURGER
location: T3 / 2F / Before Security Check
about: The basic element of the Freshness Burger menu is 'Handmade, delicious, and healthy options!' We use juicy patty and vegetables produced in Japan for our hamburger. We also offer freshly-fried Hokkaido potatoes and various original drinks. Our store can be enjoyed also as a cafe.

name: FRUITPARLOR Mi'z
location: T2 Center / 2F / After Security Check (International Flights)
about: Seasonal fruit parfaits, fruit sandwiches and smoothies prepared with carefully selected fresh fruit and handmade ice cream from the age-old purveyor of fruit in Yokohama, Mizunobu Fruit Parlor.

name: FUJIYA RESTAURANT
location: T1 Central Building / 5F / Before Security Check
about: Bring your family to enjoy Fujiya's extensive children's menu and perennial selections while watching aircraft arrive and depart from Narita Airport.

name: Ginshari Hokkaido
location: T1 Central Building / 5F / Before Security Check
about: This specialty Hokkaido onigiri restaurant offers a lively atmosphere by cooking 'Fukkurinko' Special A-grade Rice from Hokkaido in-house and pressing the onigiri into shape right in front of the customers' eyes.Shiretoto shaké (salmon), Kojohama cod roe, Hokkaido beef, cream cheese and other select delicacies from the northern land and sea are pressed into a smooth rice ball.Combined with homemade pork miso soup, the perfect match for the rice, it is enjoyable at any time from breakfast to dinner.Try onigiri for yourself, the soul food of the Japanese.
